script: CREATE TABLE evaluation ( id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, createdAt DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updatedAt DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,  performanceScore DECIMAL(3, 2) NULL, feedback TEXT NULL, internId INT, mentorId INT, CONSTRAINT FK_evaluation_intern FOREIGN KEY (internId) REFERENCES intern(id),  CONSTRAINT FK_evaluation_mentor FOREIGN KEY (mentorId) REFERENCES mentor(id)  );
